TermsContent.item1Text: By accessing and using ZenBitRock's services, you agree to abide by these Terms and Conditions and any additional terms and policies referenced herein.
TermsContent.item2Text: Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
TermsContent.item3Text: You may be required to create an account to access certain services. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and ensuring that it is accurate and up-to-date.
TermsContent.item4Text: All content on our platform, including but not limited to text, images, and logos, is the property of ZenBitRock and is protected by copyright and other applicable laws.
TermsContent.item5Text: You agree not to engage in any activity that may disrupt or interfere with our services or violate any applicable laws. This includes but is not limited to: spamming, hacking, or distributing harmful content.
TermsContent.item6Text: If you make a payment on our platform, you agree to provide accurate payment information. Payments are subject to our refund and cancellation policies.
TermsContent.item7Text: Our services are provided 'as is' and without warranties of any kind, either expressed or implied.
TermsContent.item8Text: AgenWise is not liable for any direct or indirect damages that result from the use of our services or any interruptions, errors, or omissions in our services.
TermsContent.item9Text: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to our services at our discretion, without prior notice.
TermsContent.item10Text: We may update these Terms and Conditions from time to time. You are responsible for checking for updates.
TermsContent.item11Text: These Terms and Conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Ukraine, and any disputes will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Ukraine.
TermsContent.item12Text: If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at welcome@zenbit.tech

TermsContent.item14Text: You agree not to engage in any activity that may disrupt or interfere with our services or violate any applicable laws. This includes but is not limited to: spamming, hacking, or distributing harmful content.
TermsContent.item15Text: If you make a payment on our platform, you agree to provide accurate payment information. Payments are subject to our refund and cancellation policies.
